mapper.select: SELECT concat( prifixStr , case when connStr <> '' and prifixStr <> '' then connStr else '' end , seqNum ) as seqNum from ( select ifnull(prifixStr, '') as prifixStr, ifnull(connStr, '') as connStr, subString(concat('0000000000000000', curNum), -curNumSize) as seqNum from tb_sequence_info where seqId = #{seqId} ) as tt

select week_num, min(week_date) sdate, max(week_date) edate from ( select case when week(week_date) = 0 then 52 else week(week_date) end week_num , week_date from ( select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(concat(#{year},'-01-01'), INTERVAL (conday) DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')as week_date from ( select concat(a.a, b.a, c.a) conday from (select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9 ) as a cross join (select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) as b cross join (select 0 as a union all select 1 union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9) as c ) A where conday <= '380' )A ) A where week_num = #{week_num}
and week_date > concat(#{year},'-06-01')
